com.risk.team.strategy

Class Aggressive

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.team.strategy.PlayerBehavior
        • com.risk.team.strategy.Aggressive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Aggressive
extends PlayerBehavior
    Aggressive class contains methods for the Player Behavior Strategies of computer player.

    An aggressive computer player strategy that focuses on attack (reinforces its strongest country, then always attack with it until it cannot attack anymore, then fortifies in order to maximize aggregation of forces in one country).

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    yashgolwala, Harsh Mehta
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
